comment.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://distribute.vpslog.net/#](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdistribute.vpslog.net%2F%23) ### Comment > 每过一小段时间，网页就会弹窗“请关闭广告屏蔽插件”，如果点击弹窗里面的“确定”按钮，会强制刷新网页，中断网页上的所有操作。 > > Every couple of minutes or so, a pop-up message appears on the webpage asking you to disable your ad-blocker. If you click 'OK' on the prompt, the webpage will forcefully reload and interrupt anything you were doing. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/Q7EAL0x.png)

issue.body:
### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
